Name: I.D.F.K.
About the game: I.D.F.K. is a open-world survival game with only two rules: stay alive, no matter how you must do it. And dominate economically. But don't forget, you're not alone... PLEASE NOTE: I.D.F.K. is still in considerably early access and is currently only supporting some main features and functionality and will improve as time goes on Key Features With no save points, when you die, expect to have to start over again. Complex survival mechanics, including hunting, crafting, building, health, economy, and resource management. Trading of vehicles, weapons, tools, ammo, and other items at the traders. Unpredictable interactions with other players leading to limitless play emergent gameplay. Up to 100 players striving to survive by any means necessary. Make ally's, kill on sight, or kidnap strangers and bend them to your desire, or be betrayed. Anything and Everything is possible. An array of environmental threats can make survival more difficult than you may expect. Some features and functions may not be fully functional.
